Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.name: auto
Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Automatically chooses a preset that does best enhancement to a photo.

Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.name: fixDark

Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.name: fixNoise

Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Removes abnormal tint (yellow, blue, green, etc.) from your photos.

Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.name: outdoor
Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Optimizes your landscape photographs with more color vibrancy. The contrast is adjusted to reveal slightly

Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.name: fireworks
Enums/TransformEnhancePreset.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Applies correction for dark night sky and sets off excess colors from fireworks.

Classes/ConvertTransform.html.abstract: Converts the image to a different format.

Classes/CopyrightTransform.html.abstract: Detects whether your image is copyright protected or not, and if it is protected, returns all types and related

Classes/ImageSizeTransform.html.name: ImageSizeTransform
